Alaris.Irc.ConnectionArgs

Alaris.Irc.ConnectionArgs Struct Reference

A collection of parameters necessary to establish an IRC connection. More...

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

 ConnectionArgs (string name, string hostname)
 Create a new instance initialized with the default values: TCP/IP port 6667, no server password, and user mode invisible.

Properties

string Hostname [get, set]
 The IRC server hostname.
string ModeMask [get, set]
 Set's the user's initial IRC mode mask. Set to 0 to recieve wallops and be invisible. Set to 4 to be invisible and not receive wallops.
string Nick [get, set]
 The user's nick name.
int Port [get, set]
 The TCP/IP port the IRC listens server listens on.
string RealName [get, set]
 The user's 'real' name.
string UserName [get, set]
 The user's machine logon name.
string ServerPassword [get, set]
 The password for this server. These are seldomly used. Set to '*'.

Detailed Description

A collection of parameters necessary to establish an IRC connection.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Alaris.Irc.ConnectionArgs.ConnectionArgs ( string  name,
string  hostname 
)

Create a new instance initialized with the default values: TCP/IP port 6667, no server password, and user mode invisible.

Parameters:
name The nick, user name, and real name are all set to this value.
hostname The hostname of the IRC server.

Property Documentation

string Alaris.Irc.ConnectionArgs.Hostname [get, set]

The IRC server hostname.

The full hostname such as irc.gamesnet.net

string Alaris.Irc.ConnectionArgs.ModeMask [get, set]

Set's the user's initial IRC mode mask. Set to 0 to recieve wallops and be invisible. Set to 4 to be invisible and not receive wallops.

A number mask such as 0 or 4.

string Alaris.Irc.ConnectionArgs.Nick [get, set]

The user's nick name.

A string which conforms to the IRC nick standard.

int Alaris.Irc.ConnectionArgs.Port [get, set]

The TCP/IP port the IRC listens server listens on.

Normally should be set to 6667.

string Alaris.Irc.ConnectionArgs.RealName [get, set]

The user's 'real' name.

A short string with any legal characters.

string Alaris.Irc.ConnectionArgs.ServerPassword [get, set]

The password for this server. These are seldomly used. Set to '*'.

A short string with any legal characters.

string Alaris.Irc.ConnectionArgs.UserName [get, set]

The user's machine logon name.

A short string with any legal characters.
